/* package codechef; // don't place package name! */

import java.util.*;
import java.lang.*;
import java.io.*;

/* Name of the class has to be "Main" only if the class is public. */
class Codechef
{
	public static void main (String[] args) throws java.lang.Exception
	{
		// your code goes here
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		int t=sc.nextInt();
		for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
		{
		     String s1=sc.next();
		     String s2=sc.next();
		     int a[]=new int[123];
		     int b[]=new int[123];
		     if(s1.length()!=s2.length())
		     {
		          System.out.println("NO");
		     }
		     else
		     {
		          for(int o=0;o<s1.length();o++)
		          {
		               char ch=s1.charAt(o);
		               int q=(int)ch;
		               a[q]++;
		          }
		          for(int p=0;p<s2.length();p++)
		          {
		               char ch1=s2.charAt(p);
		               int q1=(int)ch1;
		               b[q1]++;
		          }
		          int c1=0;
		          for(int h=90;h<123;h++)
		          {
		              if(a[h]==b[h])
		              {
		                   c1=0;
		              }
		              else
		              {
		                   c1=1;
		                   break;
		              }
		          }
		          if(c1==1)
		          {
		               System.out.println("NO");
		          }
		          else
		          {
		               System.out.println("YES");
		          }
		     }
		}
		
	}
}
